results.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate 2018
results.headline: Want to pass the AWS Solutions Architect - Associate Exam? Want to become Amazon Web Services Certified? Do this course!
objectives_summary: Pass the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Exam
Design Highly Resilient and Scaleable Websites on AWS
Become Intimately Familiar With The AWS Platform

results.title: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate 2018
results.headline: Want to pass the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator Exam? Want to become Amazon Web Services Certified? Do this course!
objectives_summary: Pass the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator 2017 - Associate Exam
Become a certified AWS SysOps Administrator
Become Intimately Familiar With The AWS Platform

results.title: Become a Professional Python Programmer
results.headline: Learn all the important skills Python programmers need to get all the best programming jobs
objectives_summary: Understand and implement basic Python code
Create and run a real-world Python program
Access and parse the web with Python

results.title: Learn DevOps: CI/CD with Jenkins using Pipelines and Docker
results.headline: Use Jenkins the DevOps way. Automate your Jenkins jobs by using Jenkins Pipelines, Docker, and the Jenkins Job DSL
objectives_summary: Use Jenkins to perform Continuous Integration within your Software Development Lifecycle
Install Jenkins using docker
Configure Jenkins “The DevOps way”, using Docker, Jobs DSL and Jenkins Pipelines

results.title: Distributed Tasks Demystified with Celery, SQS & Python
results.headline: Conjure up your first Python scalable background worker
objectives_summary: Fundamentals of multithreading in python
How to implement distributed tasks with Python & Django
Implement message passing communication between processes to build parallel applications

results.title: The Science of Happiness & Success
results.headline: Learn the scientific recipe for lasting happiness & success
objectives_summary: Evaluate happiness & success using scientific parameters
Identify what keeps distracting you from boosting your happiness & success
Apply the key concept that boosts happiness & success in every aspect of life

results.title: Learn Devops: Continuously Deliver Better Software
results.headline: Excel in delivering and deploying software using Git, Vagrant, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Apply DevOps in your team
Understand Continuous Delivery
Automate the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC)

results.title: Docker Crash Course for busy DevOps and Developers
results.headline: Learn how to develop and deploy web applications with Docker technologies. Take your DevOps skills to the next level.
objectives_summary: Containerize a web-based application with a microservice approach and automate it using Dockerfile
Design multi-container applications and automate the workflow using Compose
Scale Docker workflow with Docker Swarm, orchestrate and deploy a large-scale application across multiple hosts in the cloud

results.title: Mastering Ansible
results.headline: A complete guide to configuration management and orchestration with Ansible.
objectives_summary: Execute ad-hoc commands against servers using Ansible
Write Ansible configuration playbooks to deploy a 3-tier web application
Configure Ansible roles with tasks, handlers, files, templates, and default variables

results.title: The Complete Cyber Security Course : Hackers Exposed!
results.headline: Volume 1 : Become a Cyber Security Specialist, Learn How to Stop Hackers, Prevent Hacking,  Learn IT Security &  INFOSEC
objectives_summary: An advanced practical skillset in defeating all online threats - advanced hackers, trackers, malware and all Internet nastiness including mitigating government spying and mass surveillance.
Become a cyber security specialist.
The very latest up-to-date information and methods.

results.title: Learn DevOps: The Complete Kubernetes Course
results.headline: Kubernetes will run and manage your containerized applications. Learn how to build, deploy, use, and maintain Kubernetes
objectives_summary: Install and configure Kubernetes (on your laptop/desktop or production grade cluster on AWS)
Use Docker Client (with kubernetes), kubeadm, kops, or minikube to setup your cluster
Be able to run stateless and stateful applications on Kubernetes

results.title: Learn DevOps: Infrastructure Automation With Terraform
results.headline: Learn how to automate your infrastructure with terraform. Covers Terraform with AWS, Packer, Docker, ECS, EKS, Jenkins
objectives_summary: Understand, use and apply terraform
Know when to use different features
Use terraform with AWS
